title: Username&password is Disclosure in readme file in [https://█████████]
content:
Summary:
Username&password is Disclosure for login into dashboard in readme file in [https://███]
Description:
open this and u will see the username and password in the file
Impact
Disclosure Sensitive Information "username&password"
steps: Navigate to the readme file at the provided URL: [https://█████████]
View the contents of the readme file to find the disclosed username and password
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the disclosure of sensitive login credentials (username and password) in a publicly accessible readme file. This allows unauthorized access to the dashboard by simply reading the file.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires accessing a publicly available file and reading its contents. There are no complex interactions, state manipulations, or novel logic involved.
